Saw this on ebay and on wound's database...  

Does anyone know enough about these titles to confirm that they're standalone titles?  In particular, I"m curious to know if Pichi Comics did any more anthologies for other Shinsengumi members.

thx
-s


Shinsengumi - The Requiem of Asagi Color by Junko Tamura 
Published by Action Comics Shusuisha Girls in 2004.  Approx 200 pages. 


Shinsengumi Okita Soushi Kirameki no Zanzou Anthology

Published by Pichi Comics in 2004.  Approx 200 pages.  


Shinsengumi Hijikata Saizou Jinshou no Ginrou Anthology

Published by Pichi Comics in 2004.  Approx 200 pages.
